TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemSounds extends System.Object

summary.span: 擷取與一組 Windows 作業系統音效事件類型關聯的音效。

span.span: Retrieves sounds associated with a set of Windows operating system sound-event types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供方法，用於擷取與目前使用者的作業系統音效事件類型的一組相關的聲音。The class provides methods for retrieving the sounds associated with a set of operating system sound-event types for the current user. 在 Windows 控制台中，您可以設定每一種作業系統音效事件相關聯的音效。The sounds associated with each type of operating system sound event can be configured in Windows Control Panel. 提供靜態方法，以存取相關聯的音效， ， ，和音效的事件。 provides static methods to access the sounds associated with the , , , and sound events. 每個屬性會傳回，可以用來播放音效。Each property returns a that can be used to play the sound.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Media.SystemSound Asterisk { get; }
.property class System.Media.SystemSound Asterisk
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Asterisk As SystemSound
public: static property System::Media::SystemSound ^ Asterisk { System::Media::SystemSound ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得目前 Windows 音效配置中，與 程式事件相關的音效。

span.span: Gets the sound associated with the program event in the current Windows sound scheme.

value.span: 目前 Windows 音效配置中，與 程式事件相關的 。

span.span: A associated with the program event in the current Windows sound scheme.
